committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To amend the National School Lunch Act to protect school districts and the Department of Agriculture from anti-competitive activities of suppliers that sell commodities to schools that participate in the school lunch program, the school breakfast program, the special milk program, and the summer food service program for children, and for other purposes.
subjects: Day care centers for the aged
Federal aid to maternal health services

summary.text: Child Nutrition Protection Act of 1994 - Amends the National School Lunch Act to direct the Secretary of Agriculture (Secretary) to provide State and local agencies with training and other assistance to prevent fraud and anticompetitive activities in the school lunch, school breakfast, special milk, summer food service, WIC, and child and adult care food programs. Directs the Secretary to bar a company for at least three years (five years for a repeat conviction) from program participation upon conviction for anticompetitive or specified related activities.

titles.title: To amend the National School Lunch Act to protect school districts and the Department of Agriculture from anti-competitive activities of suppliers that sell commodities to schools that participate in the school lunch program, the school breakfast program, the special milk program, and the summer food service program for children, and for other purposes.
